long_description: You can still be close to nature without having to sleep right on it. The REI Camp Folding cot sets up quickly and gets you off the ground for comfort on your car-camping adventures. Cot accommodates large and small sleepers alike with a maximum capacity of 300 lbs.; bed height is 17.5 in. Sleeping surface stays taut and supportive from head to toe for a comfortable night's sleep. Steel frame and 600-denier ripstop polyester fabric are light yet strong. REI Camp Folding cot folds up for convenient storage and travel in the provided carry bag.
